submission:
class Solution(object):
    def maxOperations(self, s):
        """
        :type s: str
        :rtype: int
        """
        s+='1';
        r = 0
        c = 0
        n = len(s)
        i = 0
        while i<n:
            if s[i]=='1':
                j=i
                while j<n and s[j]=='1':
                    j+=1
                r+=c
                c+=j-i
                i=j
            else: i+=1
        
        return r
